author: Rgijaba
title: why did i get this if im not a ferrari fan?
review: because i am a TT fan and this is on 1:55 scale, meaning its realy a TT.its a fun little set, and its nice to finaly be able to have carbon star race a ferrari F1! sure, some lego ferrari fans dont like it, but we TT fans do!i had fun putting on all the realy small stickers! i like how truck like it is, and it looks just like the real thing only smaller.and if you get the other TT ferrari, you can have a more complete TT collection!i reccomend this set to TT fans, Ferrari fans, and car/truck fans.great set!

author: anakayam
title: go race......
review:
this is really fun set. i use this set n combine it with my TT collection. and it's like nascar race.....
i give 2 thumbs up for make Ferrari truck in TT scale. this is really good set.              
For this set:
- great truck with tiny spoke wheels
- tiny F1 car

cons:
- it's still using sticker.

but it's alright, so it's good to have this set!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Tiny Turbos) - Ferrari F1 Truck Review
review:
This set is one of the coolest LEGO Racers (Tiny Turbo) sets which is licensed to ferrari. The built is fun and easy. The bags are numbered and we get a few stickers which you have to put on. The whole set is very sturdy too. We get a very cool finish line, a truck and only one formula 1 car. I really like the details on the sponsors and the truck looks really cool. The door in the back does open if you want to store the formula 1 car and the doors on the side open too if you want to take out the extra tyres. We don't get any minifigs and this set doesn't have much play features but it's still a cool set to have.

All in all this set is a cool set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
